CustomField.formula: CASE( StageName,"Noticed",IMAGE("/resource/n1","Noticed",100,800),"Identified",IMAGE("/resource/i2","Identified",100,800),"Validated",IMAGE("/resource/v3","Validated",100,800),"Qualified",IMAGE("/resource/q4","Qualified",100,800),"Conditional Agreement",IMAGE("/resource/c5","Conditional Agreement",100,800),"Closed Won",IMAGE("/resource/wl6","Closed Won",100,800),"Closed Lost",IMAGE("/resource/wl6","Closed Lost",100,800),IMAGE("/resource/sales_proc","Sales Process",100,800))
CustomField.label: Stage Image
